sentences.en: And existing problem of industrialize of solving deposit and stabilizing water quality were pointed.
sentences.cn: 指出了生产中避免结垢、稳定水质和实现工业化需要解决的问题.

sentences.en: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialize.
sentences.cn: 能源消耗随着各国工业化而增加。

sentences.en: For China to modernize its economy, it must further industrialize, and urbanize.
sentences.cn: 为了使经济现代化, 中国必须扩大工业化和城市化.

sentences.en: Many townships in the coastal area have begin to industrialize.
sentences.cn: 沿海地区的许多乡镇已开始工业化.

sentences.en: The southern part of the country was slow to industrialize.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的南部工业化进程缓慢。

sentences.en: The special biochemistry and the industrialize principle knowledge should be involved ( except common sense ).
sentences.cn: 不涉及专门的生物化学、工业化学原理知识 ( 常识除外 ).

sentences.en: We also realize the growing need and necessity to industrialize certain sections of the economy.
sentences.cn: 我们也认识到越来越需要使某些经济部门实行工业化.

sentences.en: We also realized the growing need and necessity to industrialize certain sectioned to pur - sue it.
sentences.cn: 译为我们也认识到越来越需要使某些经济部门工业化.
